title: High Flyer Death Defyer
description:
ON SALE!!!!  Previously $3.99 but now $1.99!!  Enjoy the Holiday savings guys because it is only reduced in price for a limited time!!

*Please use the Touchpad to navigate the games menus. Thanks!

Take flight in an exciting action packed adventure through the skies of Machine City.  You will roll, dive, and dodge your way through dangerous obstacles in order to safely land on floating islands in the sky. Along the way, you must snag valuable treasures.

The story takes place 20 years after the Thundering. This great cataclysm destroyed the world as we know it, and Earth's survivors now live on the floating city of Caen. The Earth has changed, but that doesn't stop Arreon from fulfilling his dream of exploring the skies.

You'll fly up to speeds of 300 MPH, acquire awesome Boost and Speed rings, and zoom past gigantic killer beasts. Earn extended jetpack activation zones, and negotiate your way through gas clouds and other hair-raising obstacles. High Flyer is not for the faint of heart.

High Flyer Jetpack Tests includes a hands-on tutorial, full calibration and control settings, a 100+ comic book panel story, and a sweeping musical score befitting an airborne epic. 

There are two things every kid dreams of having, a Jetpack and a Lightsaber.  This game has the first half of that covered.

Strap on your jetpack and take flight in this 3-D aerial adventure exclusively on OUYA.

•	10 Story Missions
•	17 Jetpack Test Missions
•	Play as either Arreon or Charisma
•	Discover all of the Floating Islands
•	Free all of the enslaved Aliens
•	Earn new powers like “Life After Death”
•	Hours of Replayability
•	Non Linear Level Design
•	Speed and Treasure Challenges

releases.cert_subject: C = US, O = Android, CN = Android Debug

overview: Released in October 2013 by Game Mechanic Studios, LLC.
